net.sf.sprockets.picasso

Class GradientTransformation

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.sf.sprockets.picasso.GradientTransformation
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Transformation

    public class GradientTransformation
extends Object
implements Transformation
    Overlays a gradient on the bitmap to be transformed.
    Since:
    2.1.0

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      GradientTransformation(Context context, GradientDrawable.Orientation orientation)
      Use the default colors and positions.
      GradientTransformation(GradientDrawable.Orientation orientation, int[] colors, float[] positions)
      Apply a gradient of the colors at the positions in the direction of the orientation.

    • Constructor Detail

      • GradientTransformation

        public GradientTransformation(Context context,
                      GradientDrawable.Orientation orientation)
        Use the default colors and positions. The first half of the overlay will be R.color.overlay. The second half will fade from overlay to transparent.

      • GradientTransformation

        public GradientTransformation(GradientDrawable.Orientation orientation,
                      int[] colors,
                      float[] positions)
        Apply a gradient of the colors at the positions in the direction of the orientation.
        See Also:
        LinearGradient.LinearGradient(float, float, float, float, int[], float[], Shader.TileMode)
